title: Easiest 5 star review ever
body: I love this stuff. I have taken antibiotics every day for the past 4 years for a bacterial infection disease I was born with. About once or twice a year the Dr gives my body a break from the aggressive antibiotic therapy, but my immune system is completely shot. I full heartedly swear by this stuff. Even while on antibiotics I sometimes get sick if it's not bacterial, or when I'm on break I ALWAYS get sick. When I start to feel a little more under the weather than usual, I bring out my echinacea 1 pill twice a day for a week and it works miracles. Sometimes I even empty the capsules to make a tea with some local honey I was lucky to find someone sold right here in the middle of the city. Echinacea is a must have in my huge medication/first aid drawer and is the first thing I grab when I or someone around me starts feeling off and under the weather.

title: Nature's Bounty Echinacea
body: I started these products not to long ago, but I know for a fact there great!! Pure, not like the ones in your market, I can feel the greatness, purity, and differences in the quality and how my body feels, I'm a picky person, I'm very happy I gave these products a try. keep up the good work! I recommend these and all of them 100 percent!!! Thank you!

title: The closest thing to a Miracle Drug.
body: I started looking for Echinacea when my Aunt told me the magical "functions" of these little things. Told me how she and my grandma was sick the other day and after taking these pills two days straight, they had recovered. Now that might sound just like them recovering normally, but knowing my aunt and grandma for so long, they usually take 1-2 weeks to recover.

title: It really works
body: Never would have thought to pick this up until I was under the weather with a cold for over a week, and was introduced to Echinacea... after trying someone, I immediately felt the best I had in a week in the morning. Coincidence? I wasn't sure, so I ordered a bottle on Prime - 2 days later it arrived, and I took it for a week. Back to 100% in no time. I had been plugging Airborne and Emergency to no avail. My counter is now permanently stocked with Echinacea anytime I even catch a hint of an oncoming cold. This is a must for Oregon weather, and my international trips which put me in contact with all sorts of airborne virus parties I'd rather not attend. In my experience, most certainly effective.

This has worked well my whole life, and if that's how you choose to use this product, you can. However, I got sick 3 times this past winter after moving to a new, colder climate. So I bought some more echinacea and started taking it daily. And it has been working like a charm! I've been on it daily for a month now and not so much as a sniffle, and I have more energy overall! This particular brand's capsules are easy to take, and have no bitter taste or aftertaste.

title: really does a good job of keeping his runny nose and eyes to ...

Just mix half the contents of a pill into his water mug which will last a few days, break one day, and repeat.

title: Works Well For Me
body: During my recovery from pnamonina, I purchased my usual winter cold/flu weather supplement supplies without knowing of their effectiveness, as I usually begin taking this supplement, along with Goldenseal, prior to ever being ill with any sort of cold or flu. Yet, desperate to become well from being so ill with pnamonina, I ordered my supplies anyway and immediately began taking them once received. These are capsules, which are, in my opinion, be easily taken individually with liquids. I feel this product has proven to be a good quality brand of supplement for the price, and plan to continue to purchase once supplies need replenishing. To my understanding, these particular supplements have been recommended to take no more than 4 months per year. I continue to take these supplements along with Goldenseal Root to boost my immune system toward the prevention of future colds and flus...I am not a medical professional so I am unable to recommend this product, and, with the introductionof any supplement or medication, it is always best to consult your medical doctor.

title: Quality Echinacea at about 60% off
body: I use echinacea for allergies and the occasional cold. Taking 8 - 10 caps a day, I can go through a bottle quickly. The subscribe and save price is ridiculously cheap and now I never run out.  I have tried nearly every brand, plant types and delivery method - and the Nature's Bounty Echinacea works as well as any of the others. Btw, the secret to using echinacea to prevent a cold is take it early and often - 2 to 4 caps every 2 hours...right when you recognize the first symptoms of a sneeze, throat tickle or drainage. You might need to keep up the dosage for 2 to 4 days - until the symptoms go away.

title: Purpurea Root
body: Most of the Echinacea on the market consist of flower parts and stems, which have the least amount of the beneficial ingredients you buy Echinacea for.  The "now" product uses the root which is much harder to find when you check the ingredient list on other manufacturers.  I believe this is why many people do no see the results one hopes for when using Echinacea.  This product has been the best I've used and the cost to benefit ratio can't be beat, in my estimation. "Now" also makes a "Dry E" which is Tocopheryl Succinate, another hard to find product whose benefits are backed by quite a bit of research.  I would recommend this product to anyone looking for high quality Echinacea at a reasonable price.

title: It works.
body: On three different occasions I've had my husband and another visiting family member get extremely ill (common cold, URI, flu etc). From the onset of their symptoms I began taking the supplement twice a day for a week or so and never got more than a sniffle when they were so deathly ill. Something in this actually works. I'm normally the one who gets dog sick b/c someone sneezed near me, so the fact most of my family was so sick and I never had more than a slight runny nose speaks volumes to me.

title: Great quality of Echinacea. Indispensable!
body: Great product. I was used to an effervescent product which had a great taste and other powerful ingredients, besides Echinacea, but the company I work with refuses to ship to my location. So, I needed a replacement, and I bought this product by Now Foods. Well, I miss my refreshing fizzy drink, but this product is fully working. I take these capsules every time I have a headache and I feel something is coming. You know, the kind of pain that makes you feel as if you'd caught the flu. I couldn't find anything else than Echinacea that works for me.

body: Works!!!!!!!!!!  My mom recently had a severe cold that lasted more than 3 weeks even with 2 doctor's visits and a course of anti-biotics. I was her care taker so I knew I couldn't get sick. I took this echinacea throughout this period and I didn't get sick! Another time I was suddenly feeling ill with nausea in the afternoon. Took couple of echinacea caps plus a doze of Tylenol and by 11pm I was feeling a lot better and was able to get out of bed and make myself a big dinner. I have been using achinacea for more than couple of decades. From my own experience, echinacea ROOT POWDER works for me EVERY SINGLE TIME, while extracts and other parts had no noticeable effect. I stick with Now brand because it's the only inexpensive echinacea root product I know and is readily available.

title: No colds
body: There's some controversy about Echinacea. A lot of studies show it isn't effective against colds and flu. Regardless of the studies, I've been taking this supplement daily for twenty-six years--since my near life-ending heart by- pass operation--and  . . . I haven't had a cold in all of that time. Odd thing is, occasionally I'll get the symptoms of a cold coming on--a few sniffles and sneezes but within twenty-four hours everything's back to normal. Whether or not this is because of the efficacy of the Echinacea, I don't know, but the supplement is so inexpensive that I see no reason to eliminate it from my daily regimen.

title: Great way to help prevent colds

title: Work wonders!
body: I've used quite a few fiber supliments trying to get my son regular. These did the trick! They are much better than other supplements that made his stomach hurt or did nothing, or both. He takes these everyday now and we have had no issues since beginning them, they work wonders for a kid with lots of stomach issues. If this review was helpful please click yes!

title: ... do not have the sugary substance surrounding the gummy like other brands
body: These do not have the sugary substance surrounding the gummy like other brands. My son has sensory processing disorder and autism, which causes him to have a hard time with certain textures among other things. Sometimes he loves these and sometimes he isn't interested. But he doesn't spit them out when he eats them, so they are great in my opinion! Would recommend and repurchase as long as he keeps eating them!

title: Excellent product - helped my child to catch up to his peers even though he was labelled 'disabled' at birth.
body: Excellent product.  I can tell the difference in IQ and reaction time in my mildly autistic children from using this product.  They are usually picky, and they beg for these before bedtime each night.  My son had an ischemic brain injury due to placental abruption at birth - I attribute these to his ability to catch up physically and mentally to his peers by age 2.  I have also enjoyed algal DHA and NAC supplements for myself to help with memory and cognitive ability.

title: These gummies are perfect for my kiddos
body: These gummies are perfect for my kiddos. We were looking for a supplement that would help boost our kids immune systems, since now in school they seem to pick everything up. These gummies come in a variety of colors and shapes which my kids like. They are actual gummies (like a fruit snack) so my kids are actually excited and ask me for them if I forget (yes, how nice is that). We have purchased the sugar coated gummies - generic store brand and my kids hated them - so it's nice to finally have a product they like. The only thing I wish was different about this product is if it came in a larger container and size. We seem to go through this quite quick with 2 kids and the recommended dosage. A bulk container would be great to have for this product!

title: These were a no-go for my family.
body: Unfortunately my son took one sniff and crinkled his nose at these. I tried to convince him to just try them, so to appease me he licked one and then threw the two away that I had given him. From a shipping standpoint, they did not hold up well to the heat and were slightly melted which made the texture weird. Because I didn't want the money wasted I decided to give these a shot myself. Unfortunately I did not enjoy the taste either. These were not a good fit for us. I'm a bit bummed that I basically spent $11 for  four gummies since I have a feeling they're going to remained untouched.

title: Warning Aluminum specks stuck many gummy bears
body: I discovered after buying many bottles for my daughter there are tiny specks of aluminum that are stuck to several of the gummy bears, many are hard to see unless you look closely under a bright light.  I don't know if this is a mistake that happens in packaging, but after trying to open the seal very carefully each time and also finding it stuck to gummy bears at the bottom of the bottle I realized it wasn't how I opened the bottle, these were already stuck to the gummy bears. I check each one carefully before giving to my daughter.  I' be bought at least 15 bottles from different places and it's in all of them.  I hate to think how many I gave to her before I noticed this.  Has anyone else seen this?  If you look under bright light you can see a tiny speck of aluminum stuck to about 1 in 4 of them if not more, you can wipe it away, but I'm sure a lot of people don't see this and are giving it to their kid without realizing it.

title: Two-Year-Old Approved

I see some negative reviews about the amount of fiber per gummies being too low however; we only use two a day rather than the recommended four and it’s enough. I guess it depends on why you’re using them if it’s for regulation than I highly recommend these gummies.
